source:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Gratt is seething with fury.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
トメラの村のグラットは、苛立っているようだ。

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_TODO_00<tab>Weaken Gulg knockers, then capture them with coils of wire.
target: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_TODO_00<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F2215701 /var>を弱らせて、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8F1801 /var>で捕獲

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the captured knockers to Gratt.
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_000<tab>I've just about bloody had it! No more! I'll not stand by and see another theft go unanswered!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_000ええい、もう我慢ならん！
いつまでも、おとなしく盗まれていると思うでないぞ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_001<tab>Eh? What am I angry about!? Well, it's them blasted knockers, ain't it!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_001何に怒っているのか？　そんなもの決まっておろう！
あの、にっくきノッカーどものことじゃよ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_002<tab>Those grabby bastards latch onto anything─ore, hammers, my favorite bloody pick─and drag it back to their nests! And what for, I ask you!? The little buggers don't even have the concept of value!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_002あいつらめ、ワシの大切な道具や鉱石を拾っては、
自分たちの巣に、持って帰ってしまうんじゃ！
価値などわからんくせに生意気な……！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_003<tab>I swear there'll be no end to this until I teach 'em the error of their ways. Here's the deal, friend: help me catch some of those thieving pests, and I'll see you paid for the trouble. You in?
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_003そうじゃ！
オヌシ、報酬を支払うから、ヤツらの捕獲を手伝ってくれ！
徹底的にしつけてやらないと気がすまぬ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_004<tab>Good. I'll be going south, so you head east until you find a couple of knockers to knock about. Once they're reeling, use this wire to bind those wriggling limbs of theirs, then bring them back here to the village.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_004うむ、ではこの「」を使うがよい！
ワシは南側を受け持とう！
オヌシは東側で「」を捕まえてくれ！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_005<tab>Take that wire, and snare me a couple of knockers! There's a nest of the sneaky blighters over to the east!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_005「」で「」を捕獲してくれ！
ワシは南側を受け持つので、オヌシは東側を頼む！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_010<tab>Back already, eh? I managed to catch a few myself, but let's see your haul.
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_010おお、ずいぶんと早かったのう！
ワシも何体か捕獲して戻ってきたところじゃ。
どうだ、「ノッカー」は捕まえられたか？

TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_011ほほー！　さすがじゃ！
これほど短時間で捕まえてくるとはのう！

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_012<tab>If I'm being honest, I was worried that <var 09 E948 ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) ((a dwarf)) ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) ((an outsider)) /var> unfamiliar with the area might walk <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var> straight into a pack of hungry iguanas. Glad you proved me wrong!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_012頼もしいかぎりじゃ、礼を言うぞ！)) ((さすがは旅人ということか、
頼もしいかぎりじゃ、礼を言うぞ！)) ((よそ者のドワーフがどんなものか、心配しておったが、
なかなかやるではないか！
礼を言うぞ！)) ((さすがは旅人ということか、
頼もしいかぎりじゃ、礼を言うぞ！)) ((さすがは旅人ということか、
頼もしいかぎりじゃ、礼を言うぞ！)) ((さすがは旅人ということか、
頼もしいかぎりじゃ、礼を言うぞ！)) ((さすがは旅人ということか、
頼もしいかぎりじゃ、礼を言うぞ！)) ((さすがは旅人ということか、
頼もしいかぎりじゃ、礼を言うぞ！)) /var>

source: TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_013<tab>...Now, my prehensile pretties! Uncle Gratt is going to teach you to stop stealing ore from the Tholls...and start nicking it from the Goggs instead! Mwahahaha!
target:
TEXT_LUCKZI017_03553_GRATT_000_013くくく……こいつらは、
あの「コグー一家」から鉱石を盗み出すように、
たっぷりと訓練してくれるわ！　くはははは！
